Comment: In 2020, businesses in America told you national supply lines were disrupted. Goods were scarce and they had to increase prices. In 2021, we saw the largest inflation rate in history. They continued saying there were long-term supply chain issues. In 2022, we saw the second highest inflation rate in history as businesses continued to increase prices. By 2023, everyone agreed COVID was over and supply chains were normal - but companies continued increasing prices beyond normal inflation rates. Prices never went down even when supply and demand was corrected.   In 2025, Trump enacts tariffs. Companies tell you they have to increase their prices to mitigate the cost of business. In 2026, they‚Äôll tell you there are long-term effects from the tariffs and they have to increase prices further. In 2027, we will all agree the tariffs are gone and over but the prices will continue increasing by design.   They are recreating a post-COVID economy to steal money from you, again. If a McDonalds combo was $9 in 2019, but it‚Äôs $13 today, it will be $18 by the end of 2028. Businesses want uncontrollable inflation and growth while they still get to pay you peanuts.
Author: brakeled
